languages.text: {n}Потратив некоторое время, Эксплораторы представили на диспуте многочисленные доказательства своей правоты, главным из которых стали священные чертежи частей, сходных с деталями Горнила. К концу их речи у большинства не осталось сомнений в том, что святыня Ордена Молота на самом деле является археотехом. К голосам недовольного меньшинства, кричавшего о спорности многих доводов, не прислушались.{/n}

{n}After some preparation, the Explorators presented several pieces of evidence to support their claim, the most convincing of them being sacred blueprints of parts similar to those used in the Crucible. By the end of their speech, most were fully convinced that the Order of the Hammer's relic is indeed archeotech. Protests from the dissatisfied minority that called many of the Explorators' arguments into question were ignored.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Потратив некоторое время, Эксплораторы представили на диспуте многочисленные доказательства своей правоты, главным из которых стали священные чертежи частей, сходных с деталями Горнила. К концу их речи у большинства не осталось сомнений в том, что святыня Ордена Молота на самом деле является археотехом. К голосам недовольного меньшинства, кричавшего о спорности многих доводов, не прислушались.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}After spending some time, the Explorators have presented several pieces of evidence of their right, the most convincing of them being the sacred blueprints of the parts similar to those of the Crucible. By the end of their presentation, no one had any doubt that the relic of the Order of the Hammer is actually an archeotech.{/n}

{n}After spending some time, the Explorators have presented several pieces of evidence of their right, the most convincing of them being the sacred blueprints of the parts similar to those of the Crucible. By the end of their presentation, no one had any doubt that the relic of the Order of the Hammer is actually an archeotech.{/n}

{n}After some preparation, the Explorators presented several pieces of evidence to support their claim, the most convincing of them being sacred blueprints of parts similar to those used in the Crucible. By the end of their speech, most were fully convinced that the Order of the Hammer's relic is indeed archeotech. Protests from the dissatisfied minority that called many of the Explorators' arguments into question were ignored.{/n}

By the end of their speech, most were fully convinced that the Order of the Hammer's relic is indeed archeotech. languages.text: {n}经过一段时间的准备之后，开拓者列出了数条证据来支持他们的观点，其中最令人信服的是与熔炉所使用的部件相似的神圣蓝图。在会议结尾，大多数人都完全相信，重锤修会的遗物确实是远古科技。尽管少数人愤愤不满，提出抗议，对开拓者的诸多论点提出质疑，但这些意见被忽视了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After some preparation, the Explorators presented several pieces of evidence to support their claim, the most convincing of them being sacred blueprints of parts similar to those used in the Crucible. By the end of their speech, most were fully convinced that the Order of the Hammer's relic is indeed archeotech. Protests from the dissatisfied minority that called many of the Explorators' arguments into question were ignored.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}经过一段时间的准备之后，开拓者列出了数条证据来支持他们的观点，其中最令人信服的是与熔炉所使用的部件相似的神圣蓝图。在会议结尾，大多数人都完全相信，重锤修会的遗物确实是远古科技。尽管少数人愤愤不满，提出抗议，对开拓者的诸多论点提出质疑，但这些意见被忽视了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Después de algunos preparativos, los Exploradores presentaron varias pruebas en apoyo de su argumento, siendo la más convincente de ellas los planos sagrados de piezas similares a las utilizadas en el Crisol. Al final de su discurso, la mayoría estaba plenamente convencida de que la reliquia de la Orden del Martillo es realmente arqueotecnológica. Las protestas de la minoría insatisfecha que puso en duda muchos de los argumentos de los Exploradores fueron ignoradas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After some preparation, the Explorators presented several pieces of evidence to support their claim, the most convincing of them being sacred blueprints of parts similar to those used in the Crucible. By the end of their speech, most were fully convinced that the Order of the Hammer's relic is indeed archeotech. Protests from the dissatisfied minority that called many of the Explorators' arguments into question were ignored.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Después de algunos preparativos, los Exploradores presentaron varias pruebas en apoyo de su argumento, siendo la más convincente de ellas los planos sagrados de piezas similares a las utilizadas en el Crisol. Al final de su discurso, la mayoría estaba plenamente convencida de que la reliquia de la Orden del Martillo es realmente arqueotecnológica. Las protestas de la minoría insatisfecha que puso en duda muchos de los argumentos de los Exploradores fueron ignoradas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}さまざまな準備を行った後、エクスプロレイターは自分たちの主張を裏付ける証拠をいくつか提示した。その中で最も説得力があったのは、坩堝で使用されたものと同様の部品の神聖な設計図だった。演説が終わるころには、ほとんどの関係者が鉄槌の修道会の遺物が技術遺産であるに違いないと完全に確信していた。不満を抱く少数派の司祭が提起した、エクスプロレイターの主張に対する疑問は無視された。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After some preparation, the Explorators presented several pieces of evidence to support their claim, the most convincing of them being sacred blueprints of parts similar to those used in the Crucible. By the end of their speech, most were fully convinced that the Order of the Hammer's relic is indeed archeotech. Protests from the dissatisfied minority that called many of the Explorators' arguments into question were ignored.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}さまざまな準備を行った後、エクスプロレイターは自分たちの主張を裏付ける証拠をいくつか提示した。その中で最も説得力があったのは、坩堝で使用されたものと同様の部品の神聖な設計図だった。演説が終わるころには、ほとんどの関係者が鉄槌の修道会の遺物が技術遺産であるに違いないと完全に確信していた。不満を抱く少数派の司祭が提起した、エクスプロレイターの主張に対する疑問は無視された。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Après de minutieux préparatifs, les Explorators présentent plusieurs preuves afin d'étayer leurs revendications, dont la plus convaincante n'est autre que les plans sacrés de pièces similaires à celles constituant le Creuset. À la fin de leur plaidoyer, la majorité de l'auditoire est convaincue que la relique de l'Ordre du Marteau est bel et bien un artefact archéotechnologique. Les protestations furieuses de la minorité, qui remet en cause une grande partie des arguments des Explorators, sont ignorées.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After some preparation, the Explorators presented several pieces of evidence to support their claim, the most convincing of them being sacred blueprints of parts similar to those used in the Crucible. By the end of their speech, most were fully convinced that the Order of the Hammer's relic is indeed archeotech. Protests from the dissatisfied minority that called many of the Explorators' arguments into question were ignored.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Après de minutieux préparatifs, les Explorators présentent plusieurs preuves afin d'étayer leurs revendications, dont la plus convaincante n'est autre que les plans sacrés de pièces similaires à celles constituant le Creuset. À la fin de leur plaidoyer, la majorité de l'auditoire est convaincue que la relique de l'Ordre du Marteau est bel et bien un artefact archéotechnologique. Les protestations furieuses de la minorité, qui remet en cause une grande partie des arguments des Explorators, sont ignorées.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Nach einige Vorbereitung haben die Exploratoren verschieden Beweise vorgelegt, um ihre Argumente zu unterstützen. Die überzeugendsten darunter waren heilige Blaupausen von ähnlichen Teilen, wie sie im Tiegel zum Einsatz kommen. Am Ende ihres Plädoyers waren die meisten vollkommen überzeugt, dass es sich bei der Reliquie des Ordens des Hammers in der Tat um Archäotech handelt. Beschwerden der unzufriedenen Minderheit, die viele der Argumente der Exploratoren anzweifelte, wurden ignoriert.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After some preparation, the Explorators presented several pieces of evidence to support their claim, the most convincing of them being sacred blueprints of parts similar to those used in the Crucible. By the end of their speech, most were fully convinced that the Order of the Hammer's relic is indeed archeotech. Protests from the dissatisfied minority that called many of the Explorators' arguments into question were ignored.{/n}

Beschwerden der unzufriedenen Minderheit, die viele der Argumente der Exploratoren anzweifelte, wurden ignoriert.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bir miktar hazırlığın ardından Keşiftörler, iddialarını destekleyecek birçok delil sundular. Aralarında en inandırıcı olanlar, Pota'da kullanılana benzer kutsal taslak parçaları. Konuşmalarının sonunda çoğunluk, Çekiç Tarikatı'nın yadigârının gerçekten de bir arkeotek olduğuna tamamen ikna oldu. Hoşnutsuz bir azınlık, protestolarında Keşiftörlerin tartışmaya açık savlarının büyük bir kısmının yok sayıldığını ifade ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After some preparation, the Explorators presented several pieces of evidence to support their claim, the most convincing of them being sacred blueprints of parts similar to those used in the Crucible. By the end of their speech, most were fully convinced that the Order of the Hammer's relic is indeed archeotech. Protests from the dissatisfied minority that called many of the Explorators' arguments into question were ignored.{/n}
